name: flow-tracking

datasource.description: Enable to include datasource information for each linked object.

count.description: Maximum number of entries to return.

skip_to.description: Skip to Nth CMDB entry. Only collect statistical data after it.

with_meta.description: Enable to include meta information about each object (type id, references, etc).

with_contents_hash.description: Enable to include a checksum of each object's contents.

skip.description: Enable to call CLI skip operator to hide skipped properties.

format.description: List of property names to include in results, separated by | (i.e. policyid|srcintf).

filter.description:
Filtering multiple key/value pairs
Operator     |   Description
==     |   Case insensitive match with pattern.
!=     |    Does not match with pattern (case insensitive).
=@     |    Pattern found in object value (case insensitive).
!@     |    ﻿Pattern not﻿ found in object value (case insensitive).
<=     |    Value must be less than or equal to ﻿pattern﻿.
<     |    Value must be less than pattern﻿.
.>=    |    Value must be greater than or equal to ﻿pattern﻿.
.>     |    Value must be greater than ﻿pattern﻿.
Logical OR    |    Separate filters using commas ','
Logical AND    |    Filter strings can be combined to create logical AND queries by including multiple filters in the request.
Combining AND and OR    |    You can combine AND and OR filters together to create more complex filters.

key.description: If present, objects will be filtered on property with this name.

pattern.description: If present, objects will be filtered on property with this value.

datasource_format.description: A map of datasources to a string of attributes, separated by | (ie: policyid|srcintf). If specified, this will add the attributes listed for any linked objects.

unfiltered_count.description: Maximum number of unfiltered entries to interate through.

stat-items.description: Items to count occurrence in entire response (multiple items should be separated by '|').

primary_keys.description: The primary key to find indexes for.

action.description:
default: Return the CLI default values for entire CLI tree.
meta: Return meta data for a specific object, table, or the entire CLI tree.
json-schema: Return JSON Schema for entire CLI tree.
schema: Return schema for entire CLI tree.

vdom.description:
Specify the Virtual Domain(s) from which results are returned or changes are applied to. If this parameter is not provided, the management VDOM will be used. If the admin does not have access to the VDOM, a permission error will be returned.
The URL parameter is one of:
vdom=root (Single VDOM)
vdom=vdom1,vdom2 (Multiple VDOMs)
vdom=* (All VDOMs)

Specify the Virtual Domain(s) from which results are returned or changes are applied to. If this parameter is not provided, the management VDOM will be used. If the admin does not have access to the VDOM, a permission error will be returned.
The URL parameter is one of:
vdom=root (Single VDOM)
vdom=vdom1,vdom2 (Multiple VDOMs)
vdom=* (All VDOMs)

action.description:
If supported, an action can be specified.
_move_: Move this specific resource.
When *action=move* is set, one of the extra parameters (*before*, *after*) must be provided.
__*Note:*__ If this parameter is provided when not supported, the action will be ignored and an “invalid request” error will be returned.

before.description:
If *action=move*, use *before* to specify the ID of the resource that this resource will be moved before.
For example, to move `object 1` to before `object 2`, use:
__action=move&before=2__
__*Note:*__ This parameter can only be used when the *action* parameter is set to *move*.

after.description:
If *action=move*, use *after* to specify the ID of the resource that this resource will be moved after.
For example, to move `object 1` to after `object 3`, use:
__action=move&after=3__
__*Note:*__ This parameter can only be used when the *action* parameter is set to *move*.

scope.description:
Specify the Scope from which results are returned or changes are applied to. Objects are only existed in VDOMs scope.
scope=vdom

GET.summary:
Select all entries in a CLI table.
 Access Group: wifi

PUT.summary:
Update this specific resource.
 Access Group: wifi

help: Configure FortiSwitch flow tracking and export via ipfix/netflow.

sample-mode.name: sample-mode
sample-mode.help: Configure sample mode for the flow tracking.

options.name: local
options.help: Set local mode which samples on the specific switch port.
options.label: Local
options.description: Set local mode which samples on the specific switch port

options.name: perimeter
options.help: Set perimeter mode which samples on all switch fabric ports and fortilink port at the ingress.
options.label: Perimeter
options.description: Set perimeter mode which samples on all switch fabric ports and fortilink port at the ingress

options.name: device-ingress
options.help: Set device -ingress mode which samples across all switch ports at the ingress.
options.label: Device Ingress
options.description: Set device -ingress mode which samples across all switch ports at the ingress

sample-rate.name: sample-rate
sample-rate.help: Configure sample rate for the perimeter and device-ingress sampling(0 - 99999).

port.name: port
port.help: Collector port number(0-65535, default:0, netflow:2055, ipfix:4739).

transport.name: transport
transport.help: Collector L4 transport protocol for exporting packets.

options.name: ip
options.help: Collects srcip/dstip from the sample packet.
options.label: Ip
options.description: Collects srcip/dstip from the sample packet

options.name: port
options.help: Collects srcip/dstip/srcport/dstport/protocol from the sample packet.
options.label: Port
options.description: Collects srcip/dstip/srcport/dstport/protocol from the sample packet

options.name: proto
options.help: Collects srcip/dstip/protocol from the sample packet.
options.label: Proto
options.description: Collects srcip/dstip/protocol from the sample packet

options.name: mac
options.help: Collects smac/dmac from the sample packet.
options.label: Mac
options.description: Collects smac/dmac from the sample packet

max-export-pkt-size.name: max-export-pkt-size
max-export-pkt-size.help: Configure flow max export packet size (512-9216, default=512 bytes).

template-export-period.name: template-export-period
template-export-period.help: Configure template export period (1-60, default=5 minutes).

timeout-general.name: timeout-general
timeout-general.help: Configure flow session general timeout (60-604800, default=3600 seconds).

timeout-icmp.name: timeout-icmp
timeout-icmp.help: Configure flow session ICMP timeout (60-604800, default=300 seconds).

timeout-max.name: timeout-max
timeout-max.help: Configure flow session max timeout (60-604800, default=604800 seconds).

timeout-tcp.name: timeout-tcp
timeout-tcp.help: Configure flow session TCP timeout (60-604800, default=3600 seconds).

timeout-tcp-fin.name: timeout-tcp-fin
timeout-tcp-fin.help: Configure flow session TCP FIN timeout (60-604800, default=300 seconds).

timeout-tcp-rst.name: timeout-tcp-rst
timeout-tcp-rst.help: Configure flow session TCP RST timeout (60-604800, default=120 seconds).

timeout-udp.name: timeout-udp
timeout-udp.help: Configure flow session UDP timeout (60-604800, default=300 seconds).

aggregates.name: aggregates
aggregates.help: Configure aggregates in which all traffic sessions matching the IP Address will be grouped into the same flow.

ip.name: ip
ip.help: IP address to group all matching traffic sessions to a flow.
